meanings.definition: Too great, intense, or extreme to be expressed or described in words.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was unutterable.
meanings.sent2: The pain of losing a loved one is truly unutterable.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unutterable attempt at singing made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unutterable joy upon receiving the award was evident in her tears.
meanings.sent5: The unutterable power of the storm left the town in ruins.

meanings.sent1: The horror movie left an unutterable impact on the audience.
meanings.sent2: The unutterable grief of the mother who lost her child was heartbreaking.
meanings.sent3: The unutterable taste of the new dish surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The unutterable silence in the room spoke volumes about the tension.
meanings.sent5: The unutterable truth finally came to light, shocking everyone involved.
